# Analysis of "ğŸâ”‚issues" Discord Channel

## 1. Summary
The chat segment is extremely brief, containing only two messages. Enryt reports successful interaction with "rocket.hyp" after upgrading to version 0.16, thanking user 179546010303856640 (likely a developer). Ash acknowledges this positive feedback. No detailed technical discussions or problem-solving occurred in this limited exchange.

## 2. FAQ
No significant questions were asked in this brief exchange.

## 3. Help Interactions
No significant help interactions occurred in this brief exchange.

## 4. Action Items
No action items were identified in this brief exchange.

The chat contains a very brief interaction where user Enryt is responding to someone named Gert about an implementation issue. Enryt reports that on Quest 2 standalone, they cannot see video or buttons when using main branch 5d20037435 (dated 12/18/2025). Additionally, when using PCVR with Meta Horizon Link, they can see the video and buttons, but the buttons are not selectable/interactive. The message appears to be requesting help to make the implementation work properly in VR environments.

The chat contains a single message from user Valiant sharing a link to an article about a free Blender add-on that allows users to preview objects in the Outliner. The article is hosted on 80.lv, a platform known for sharing game development and 3D design resources. No further discussion or technical details were shared in this brief chat segment.
